title: Employees and Cities
description: A brief analysis on Employees and their living cities

cells.text: Let's see the number ofemployees and customers from each city that has employees in it.

cells.query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT e.EmployeeID) AS numEmployees,
	COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID) AS numCompanies,
	e.City, c.City
FROM Employees e JOIN Customers c ON
	(e.City = c.City)
GROUP BY e.City, c.City
ORDER BY numEmployees DESC;

cells.text:
Now let's see the number of employees and customers from each city that has employees
 in it using LEFT JOIN to see what happens.

cells.query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT e.EmployeeID) AS numEmployees,
	COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID) AS numCompanies,
	e.City, c.City
FROM Employees e LEFT JOIN Customers c ON
	(e.City = c.City)
GROUP BY e.City, c.City
ORDER BY numEmployees DESC;
